thread.title: Social sciences faculty awarded $8 million in research funding (University of California, Santa Cruz)
thread.title_full: Social sciences faculty awarded $8 million in research funding (University of California, Santa Cruz) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Social sciences faculty awarded $8 million in research funding (University of California, Santa Cruz)
text: ( Source : University of California, Santa Cruz ) Faculty in the Social Sciences Division of UC Santa Cruz garnered more than $8 million in research funding from just over 100 grants for the year August 2014 to August 2015 , Dean Sheldon
